page.title: 19 Recreation
page.content: We sent out questionnaires to people in the village and we found out that the community centre wasn't being used as much as it could be.The community centre is where they do activities such as:Youth club,bowls,play group etc.We found the most popular adult activities are gardening &knitting.We found the most popular activities for children are:watching T.V.and playing games outside.When we asked what activites they would like organized most people said a hard tennis court, swimming pool,monthly discos,cricket pitch and team,social club and night classes.People think that there should be more activities for younger children and especially teenage children.There is no swimming pool in Shipton,some people find it quite easy to get to a swimming pool,but others find it difficult.
